akn:section.akn:heading: Designation of members of the Supreme Court Police

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6122. Designation of members of the Supreme Court Police Under the general supervision and direction of the Chief Justice of the United States, the Marshal of the Supreme Court may designate employees of the Supreme Court as members of the Supreme Court Police, without additional compensation. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1182.)
